description:
Connascence is the taxonomy of coupling: it allows us to specify how two
or more pieces of code are connected, and suggests ways of minimising
the impact of that coupling. Ultimately this allows developers to write
software that is more flexible to change.

At the end of the talk the audience will have learned some of the forms
of connascence with real python code examples, and will understand how
to apply those principles to their own code.
title: Connascence in Python
